body.p: Dear Sir- I send herewith the affidavits of four of the neighbors of John Bransteter who has been find $200 for gaming- the men whoses names affidavits I send are all respectable & good citizens as much so as any we have & are his neighbors- from this statements I believe it is one of the few cases which should be favorably considered by the Executive, & have there fore taken the interest to write you & send there affidavits paying that his fine be remitted. You will see that one of the affiants is our county representative

I have Just learned that the three convicts which were sent from our county to the Penetentiary & released on the way by the Rebels, are back in this & Adair County armed I suppose & equiped & commiting depredations. If an inducement in the way of a reward was offered for them I expect they could be recaptured. Their names are Joseph Burdett, Calvin McDaniels & Thomas Easton.
